name: Svg
description: SVG container that implements a common pattern for sizing charts

props.name: boundedWidth
props.description: width of the canvas (the svg's width minus margins)

props.name: boundedHeight
props.description: height of the canvas (the svg's height minus margins)

props.name: margin
props.description: size of the margins on each side of the svg
props.type: { top: number; right: number; bottom: number; left: number; }

props.name: debug
props.description: if true, show the svg's outline and highlight canvas
